Michela Fanini Record Rox || |- | SAT || Saturn Cycling Team || |- | ALF || Team Alfa Lum R.S.M. || |- | ALI || Team Aliverti-Immobiliare Luca || |- | TBU || Team Bulls || |- | ELI || Team Elita || |- | FAR || Team Farm Frites-Hartol || |- | TLF || Team Lolland-Falster || |- | TIM || Timex Women's Professional Cycling Team || |- | TOA || Toscany Ahoy || |- | VLA || Vlaanderen 2002-Ladies Team || |} Source: ==References== 2000 UCI
title: List of 2000 UCI Women's Teams
